Articles.Content:
F-15B with AMRAAM-120X-1. ASAT AMRAAM is up next. (Let me know if the craft has any mod parts in it, because I had to remove a lazor module before posting this.).

Extremely high speed and maneuverable, the F-15B is more than capable of taking on almost any foe, especially if the pylons are clear. when firing, fire at full throttle with SAS, switch to the missile, and stage out after burn out for control of the missile. (Always set the the probe core to control here after you start the cruise burn.).

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/w6v1n74ajdg256p/F-15B%20AMRAAM-120X-1.craft

For the rest of the images: http://imgur.com/a/GXLEz
